thread.title: Raj Claire
thread.title_full: Love Energy Savings reviewed by Raj Claire

author: Raj Claire
title: Raj Claire
text: Every thing was properly explained and Kimberley didn't mind answering any questions that I wasn't sure about even towards the end of the call when I probably asked the questions over and over again. And hopefully we will be saving some money as well
